name: 3 pure white 100% cotton crocheted dishcloths
description: This listing is for a set of 3 crocheted dishcloths in pure white.  Other colors can be made upon request! They are made of 100% cotton and are approximately 8 x 8 inches.  These dishcloths are sturdy enough for cleaning dishes, but are soft enough to use as washcloths in your bath.  They will come rolled in bundles with fabric ties.  This set of dishcloths makes a great addition to a housewarming gift, bridal shower gift, baby shower gift or a stocking stuffer during the holiday season!

name: pretty flower washcloth
description:
This originally designed pretty washcloth is made of 100% cotton in two shades of neutral colors...pure white with an oatmeal colored border and flower. Measuring approximately7"square, it will be a gorgeous addition to your bathroom, guest bath, or kitchen. Another idea...add it in with housewarming or bridal shower gifts! The neutral colors will match anyone's decor. 

This washcloth was created in a smoke-free and pet-free home. 

Buy it by itself or pair it with cloths in solid colors. (See my other listing). This cloth does not come rolled in a bundle, as I do not want to crumple the flower.

Flower is attached very securely and will remain attached through hand and machine washings (gentle cycle to be on the safe side). :)


If you'd like more than one, convo me and I'd be happy to make more!

(Towels and bath items are not included in this listing.):)

name: 3 oatmeal 100% cotton crocheted dishcloths
description:
Hi! This listing is for a group of 3 hand-crocheted dishcloths in "oatmeal". These were created in a smoke-free and pet-free home. My great-grandma taught me how to crochet when I was only 8 years old. I am now in my thirties and am still putting this hobby to use. 

*

The cloths wash well and are 100% cotton. They make great additions to bridal shower presents, holiday gifts, or housewarming presents (or to keep for yourself!) They are approximately 8 inches x 8 inches. If you are interested in another color or size, I can make them for you instead of the oatmeal ones. A little extra time will be needed to complete the order, however.

name: set of 3 light/neutral dishcloths-your choice- 100% cotton
description:
Hi! This listing is for a mix-and-match set of 3 hand crocheted dishcloths. 

Choose any combination of the following for your 3:

pure white
latte
oatmeal

These were created in a smoke-free and pet-free home. My great-grandma taught me how to crochet when I was only 8 years old. I am now a 36-year old teacher, turned stay-at-home mommy and Army wife who is still putting this hobby to use. 

*

The cloths wash well and are 100% cotton. They make great additions to bridal shower presents, holiday gifts, or housewarming presents (or to keep for yourself!) They are approximately 8 inches x 8 inches. If you are interested in another color,size, or quantity, I can make them for you instead of the ones you see here. 

Since this is a custom order (b/c you pick the colors), allow up to a week before shipping so I can make your beautiful cloths! Ask me, I may have these ready to ship!

*

Thanks for stopping by. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me!

name: set of 3 autumn colored dishcloths - you choose the combo.
description:
Hi! This listing is for a mix-and-match set of 3 hand crocheted dishcloths in autumn colors. 

Choose any combination of the following for your 3:

pumpkin orange
chocolate brown
oatmeal 
pure white
latte

These were created in a smoke-free and pet-free home. My great-grandma taught me how to crochet when I was only 8 years old. I am now a 36-year old teacher, turned stay-at-home-mommy and Army wife who is still putting this hobby to use. 

*

The cloths wash well and are 100% cotton. They make great additions to bridal shower presents, holiday gifts, or housewarming presents (or to keep for yourself!) They are approximately 8 inches x 8 inches. If you are interested in another color,size, or quantity, I can make them for you instead of the ones you see here. 

Since this is a custom order (b/c you pick the colors), allow approximately one week before shipping so I can make your beautiful cloths! Also, ask me, I may have these ready to ship as well!
